# Byte-compiled Python files
__pycache__/
*.pyc

# Virtual environment
venv/
env/
ENV/

# Django related files
db.sqlite3
media/
staticfiles/

# Logs and error files
*.log
*.swp

# Site specific settings
*.conf

# IDE files
.vscode/
*.idea/

# Ignore local settings
local_settings.py

# Ignore sensitive information like secret keys
secret_key.txt

# Ignore Django generated files
*.DS_Store
